issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
The appcelerator.encrypteddatabase module used to be available here (from web searching):

https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/appcelerator.encrypteddatabase

But it is no longer found. Is the appcelerator encrypted database module still available

My organisation has a Pro membership.

We were looking into using it in Titanium 8.3.1 and above to replace the standard database.
fields.summary: The encrypteddatabase module is no longer available

comments.body:
This github module is no longer available, but I was told by support that it is here:

https://platform.axway.com/#/download

Reachable by (this was sent by support):
bq. You can always get this module from dashboard. Please login to our platform, then go to dashboard -> Premium Modules, then you can find and download the module "SQLite Database Encryption Module".

It would useful if this information was added to the #1 google hit:

https://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest//#!/api/Modules.EncryptedDatabase

My question was answered by support, thanks
[~narbs] we'll look to update the premium modules with a link to the downloads page
